name: Gnubit Run
description:
How far can you get before the evil robot catches up to you?

Gnubit Run is an endless runner mobile game for Android that is set in the same world as Lumen Studio's platformer Mumble: A Tumble in Time (PLAY HERE: https://lumen-studios.itch.io/mumble-a-tumble-in-time). 

  • Navigate across three lanes in order to dodge different obstacles!
  • Collect gems along your run! How many can you collect?
  • See how far you can go and try to beat your personal best!

Mobile Infinite Runner made over a 2 day game jam during AIE Major Production. The task was to create a mobile version of the game being made for the major assessment.
